Why Choose Cornfed Code

Rooted in Excellence, Growing Your Success

Based in Clinton, Iowa, I provide the strong foundation midwest and nationwide businesses need to flourish online. Here's what sets Cornfed Code apart from the competition.

Local Iowa Expertise

I understand the unique needs of Midwest businesses. Great web development requires patience, attention to detail, and understanding of what makes businesses grow.

Custom Solutions

No cookie-cutter templates here. Every website, mobile app, and web application is hand-crafted to fit your unique business needs and goals.

SEO & Growth-Focused

I don't just build websites; I create digital solutions that rank well in search engines and grow with your business. From startup to established enterprise, I've got you covered.

Personal Touch

Small business owner to small business owner, I understand your challenges. You get direct access to me, not a faceless corporation.

Modern Technology

My code is cutting-edge and built with the latest technologies. I ensure your websites and apps are fast, secure, mobile-responsive, and future-proof.

Remarkably Flexible Prices

If you have a real desire to grow, the odds are, I can work with you! Pricing is of the least concern to me and I'm hungry to help businesses grow, even if that comes with a pay cut. Hit me up with a price that will work for you and I bet there's a 99% chance we can do business!
